sentences.sContent: Indications:Clear away heat, eliminate dampness, purge pathogenic fire, put out steam, detoxicate and cure furuncles .
sentences.sContent_eng: Indications:Clear away heat, eliminate dampness, purge pathogenic fire, put out steam, detoxicate and cure furuncles .
sentences.sCn: 功能主治：清热燥湿，泻火除蒸，解毒疗疮。

sentences.sContent: Glutathione is an important active substance in body. Its the important agon in many enzyme reactions, which can scavenge free radical and detoxicate .
sentences.sContent_eng: Glutathione is an important active substance in body. Its the important agon in many enzyme reactions, which can scavenge free radical and detoxicate .
sentences.sCn: 谷胱甘肽是机体内重要的活性物质，是许多酶反应的辅基，具有清除自由基、解毒等多种生理功能。

words.tran: 用以解毒的；用以去毒的
解毒；[生化] 解毒作用

trans.tranOther: to rid (a patient) of a poison or its effects
